Detailed Description

Holds all ship state information for each ship.

State information such as current buttons pressed and health is stored in this class. Other classes that need such information can gain access to it via the public members.

Remarks:
DON'T LET THE NAME FOOL YOU: due to poor foresight, this class was left with a misnomer and is infact used by both ClientEnvironment and ServerEnvironment :P
An instance of this object holds the state data for each ship in the game.
ClientEnvironment and ServerEnvironment have friend access to this class, for efficiant updating.

Set Vel.

Parameters:
